subject: NOTIFICATION ON PAYMENT 2
body:
Dear Cleo,

Thanks for you replying to us but you have delayed in getting back to us.
The compensation is for those that lost some money in the time past by
United Nations and now the total of $1.5 million dollars has been approved
to you via ATM DEBIT MASTERCARD.

Kindly re-confirm your house address with copy of your driver's license or
passport include your whatzup number, as soon as the above subject
information is been received from you, we will let you know the next update.
Regards
Ifany .
